description: This file defines interfaces and classes related to process container management, including iteration over network interfaces, memory and CPU info, and container lifecycle management within the WPEFramework. It provides abstract classes for interacting with container attributes and control functions.

classes.name: INetworkInterfaceIterator
classes.description: Interface for iterating over network interfaces associated with a container, providing methods to retrieve the interface name, number of assigned addresses, and specific IP addresses.

classes.name: IMemoryInfo
classes.description: Interface representing memory usage statistics for a container, including allocated, resident, and shared memory sizes.

classes.name: IProcessorInfo
classes.description: Interface for obtaining CPU usage metrics of a container, including total usage and per-core usage.

classes.name: IContainerIterator
classes.description: Interface for iterating over container instances, providing access to container IDs.

classes.name: IContainer
classes.description: Interface representing a container, exposing methods to retrieve container info, control its execution state, and access resource usage statistics.

methods.name: ID
methods.description: Returns the identifier of the container.

methods.name: Pid
methods.description: Returns the process ID (PID) of the container in the host namespace.

methods.name: Memory
methods.description: Returns an interface to memory usage information.

methods.name: ProcessorInfo
methods.description: Returns an interface to CPU usage information.

methods.name: NetworkInterfaces
methods.description: Returns an iterator over the network interfaces associated with the container.

methods.name: IsRunning
methods.description: Indicates if the container is currently running.

methods.name: Start
methods.description: Starts the container with the specified command and parameters.

methods.name: Stop
methods.description: Stops the container, optionally with a timeout.

ctags.name: IContainerIterator
ctags.pattern: /^    class IContainerIterator : public Core::IIterator, public Core::IReferenceCounted {$/

ctags.name: INetworkInterfaceIterator
ctags.pattern: /^    class INetworkInterfaceIterator : public Core::IIterator,  public Core::IReferenceCounted  {$/
